stats: $[{ isPositive: true, type: '+', name: '暴击率', value: 0.05 }, { isPositive: true, type: '+', name: '暴击伤害', value: lvl  \cdot  0.01 + 0.29 }, { isPositive: true, type: 'tag', name: '暴击有5%的几率击晕 {0}', value: [2] }]$

${ let stats = [{ isPositive: true, type: '+', name: '攻击', value: lvl  \cdot  2 + getDiminishing(\text{向下取整}((stacks + 3) / 4))  \cdot  2 + 2 }, { isPositive: true, type: '+', name: '生命值', value: lvl  \cdot  200 + getDiminishing(\text{向下取整}((stacks + 2) / 4))  \cdot  200 + 200 }]; if (stacks >= 3) { stats.push({ isPositive: true, type: '+', name: '恢复', value: getDiminishing(\text{向下取整}((stacks + 9) / 12))  \cdot  0.0017 }); } if (stacks >= 4) { stats.push({ isPositive: true, type: '+', name: '暴击率', value: getDiminishing(\text{向下取整}((stacks + 8) / 12))  \cdot  0.02 }); } if (stacks >= 7) { stats.push({ isPositive: true, type: '+', name: '先发制人', value: getDiminishing(\text{向下取整}((stacks + 5) / 12))  \cdot  0.23 }); } if (stacks >= 8) { stats.push({ isPositive: true, type: '+', name: '中毒', value: getDiminishing(\text{向下取整}((stacks + 4) / 12))  \cdot  0.00013 }); } if (stacks >= 11) { stats.push({ isPositive: true, type: ' \cdot ', name: '骨头增益', value: getDiminishing(\text{向下取整}((stacks + 1) / 12))  \cdot  0.014 + 1 }); } if (stacks >= 12) { stats.push({ isPositive: true, type: '+', name: '防御', value: getApproaching(0.001, 0.005, \text{向下取整}((stacks + 48) / 60)) }); } if (stacks >= 24) { stats.push({ isPositive: true, type: '+', name: '暴击伤害', value: getApproaching(0.18, 0.9, \text{向下取整}((stacks + 36) / 60)) }); } if (stacks >= 36) { stats.push({ isPositive: true, type: '+', name: '法术之刃', value: getApproaching(0.22, 1.1, \text{向下取整}((stacks + 24) / 60)) }); } if (stacks >= 48) { stats.push({ isPositive: true, type: '+', name: '切割', value: getApproaching(0.0025, 0.0125, \text{向下取整}((stacks + 12) / 60)) }); } if (stacks >= 60) { stats.push({ isPositive: true, type: ' \cdot ', name: '怪物零件增益', value: getApproaching(0.06, 0.3, \text{向下取整}(stacks / 60)) + 1 }); } return stats; }$
$[{ isPositive: true, type: '+', name: '分裂盾', value: lvl }, { isPositive: true, type: '+', name: '复活', value: 1 }, { isPositive: true, type: 'tag', name: '恢复 {0} 你的分裂盾在复活的时候', value: [0.5] }]$
激活的卡片: $[{ type: 'heal', value: 1 }, { type: 'antidote', value: 1 }, { type: 'revive', value: 1 }, { type: 'stun', value: lvl + 24 }]$
